bronze:ProtectiveGoggles.NAME: Protective Goggles
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in the #ySequence, gain #b8 #yBlock.

bronze:DecasWashers.NAME: Deca's Washers
bronze:DecasWashers.FLAVOR: From its collection of round things with holes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b3 additional cards and add a #yDazed into your draw pile.

bronze:Timepiece.NAME: Timepiece
bronze:Timepiece.FLAVOR: From his collection of identical clocks.

bronze:Mallet.NAME: Mallet
bronze:Mallet.FLAVOR: That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 Functions in a single turn, gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity.

bronze:BottledCode.NAME: Bottled Code
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card with #yEncode. Start each combat with this card in the #ySequence.
